ygData.subject: Dragon kit goodies (was:RE: Nagafen 2; Sylly 0)
ygData.msgSnippet: All info taken from Eq lizer (http://www.gameznet.com/eq/) Arms: Fiery Vambraces:  AC 6, +5 HR. Solusek s Eye. Lambent Vambraces: AC 11, +1 Cha, +2 All.
ygData.messageBody:
All info taken from Eq'lizer (http://www.gameznet.com/eq/)

Arms:
Fiery Vambraces: AC 6, +5 HR. Solusek's Eye.
Lambent Vambraces: AC 11, +1 Cha, +2 All. Quest.

Back:
Cloak of the Ice Bear: AC 8, +20 CR, +10 hp. kill Karg Icebear.
Polar Bear Cloak: AC 5, +15 CR. Made by Krag Ice Bear.
Seahorse Scale Cloak: AC 8, +6 Dex, +35 CR. Kedge Keep
White Wolf-hide Cloak: AC 7, +3 Dex, +5 CR. Permaforst
Cloak of Flames: AC 10, +9 Dex, +9 Agl, +50 HP, +15 HR. Lord Nagafen

Chest:
Dwarven Ringmail Tunic: AC 12, +8 HR/CR/MR. Small races only. Crushbone
Gnomish Environment Suit: AC 9. +10 HR/CR/PR. Sol A
Barnacle Breastplate: AC 8, +3 HR/CR
Red Dragonscale armor: AC 21, +20 Str, +10 HR/MR. Quest
Ribcage Chest armor: AC 6, +2 HR. Misty Thicket

Ear:
Earring of Fire Reflection: AC 1, +5 HR. Gypsy merchants
Earring of Frost Resistance: AC 1, +5 CR

Face:
Lizardscale Tribal mask: AC 3, +5 Agl, +5 MR. Cazic-Thule
Pair od Bent Spectacles: +15 mana, +5 MR. North Karana
Snakeskin mask: AC 2, +5 MR. no longer drops
Spilt Paw Hide mask: AC 3 +5 MR/PR. Paw
Gold Diamond Mask: +10 HR/CR, +3 MR, +5 PR/DR. Jewel craft

Feet:
Firewalker Boots: AC 4, +5 HR. Solusek's Eye
Black Charred Boots: AC 6, +3 Agl, +5 HR/PR
Imbrued Platemail Boots: AC 14, +5 Str, +9 Sta, +10 CR. PoX

Finger:
Plat Peridot: AC 4 +10 CR. Jewel craft
Plat Emerald: AC 4 +10 FR. Jewel craft
Scarab Ring: AC 2, +2 All. Rare spawn in N Ro/S Ro/Oasis

Hands:
Lionskin Gloves: AC 5, +2 CR. Made by Ged Twigborn in Kithicor Woods.

Head:
Blackend Iron Crown: AC 5, +5 All. Runnyeye
Crown of King Tranix: AC 13, +15 Cha, +20 MR. Sol B
Crown of the Froglock Kings: AC 12, +20 FR/CR. Lower Guk
Fine Silk Turban: AC 10, +10 HR. Rare spawn in N Ro/S Ro/Oasis
Imbrued Platemail Helm: AC 14, +9 Cha, +9 Wis, +10 HR. PoX
Skull Shaped Barbute: AC 13, +35 HP, +10 MR. Lower Guk
Siryn Hair Hood: AC 5, +13 Cha, +10 HR. Rathe Mountians

Legs:
Icy Greaves: AC 8, +5 CR. Permafrost
Imbrued Platemail Greaves: AC 14, +5 Str, +9 Sta, +9 Agl, +10 MR. PoX
Mammoth Hide Leggings: AC 6, +3 Sta, +5 CR. Permafrost
Mithril Greaves: AC 10, +7 Str, +5 MR. Sol B

Neck:
Gold Hemitite necklace +7 Fire
White Gold Necklace: +5 Cha, +7 HR/CR/MR. Lower Guk
Serpent Insignia Collar: +5 All. West Commons
Cape of the Midnight Mist: AC 2, +5 Str, +7 MR. Mistmoore

Shoulder:
Bloodstained Mantle: AC 6, +3 Str, +10 MR. Unrest
Barnacle Covered Pauldron: AC 6, +5 CR. Dagnors Cauldron
Shawl of the Wind Spirit: AC 1, +2 CR. Qeynos Quest

Waist:
Drakescale Belt: AC 5, +3 DEX, +10 HR. Sol A

Wrist:
Plat Turquiose: +7 CR. Jewel Craft
Gold Emerald: AC 3, +6 HR. Jewel Craft
Symbol of Loyalty to Vox: AC 7, +7 CR. Permafrost

Throwing slot:
Dragoon Dirk: +2 Dex, +3 MR
Runed Bone Fork: +10 HR/CR/MR



Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
